name: Pokémon Picross (itch)
description:
Solve puzzles to capture pokémon! 

Download the game to save your progress.

This is a work in progress. Currently no puzzles over 50x50 will work. About half of the types have a move that can be used to help you solve puzzles.

Play in full screen mode for the best experience. Beware, changing aspect ratio after loading a puzzle can sometimes obscure clues, I'm working on fixing that.
